page.description: Specifies how the Label control should be formatted. Specifically this control sets pre-defined and international currency formats formats for labels.

section.note: The actual Text on the Label is defined in the [Field Label] properties section of the Properties list.

section.description: Clicking the [...] button next to this property opens the Display Format dialog.
Clicking the "Select Pre-Defined Formats" button displays a list of Pre-Defined Formats to select from.
Clicking the International Currency Format allows you to add international currency markers to a Label.
